name: Lucky's Adventure (Nerethon)
description:
Lucky's Adventure is a game made for the Mini-Jam-80, about a cat that shoots arrows and throws dynamite.

Controls: 

Jump: Z

Shoot: X

Throw Dynamite: C

Movement with arrow keys.

This game was made with the awesome JuicyBoot he did all the art & music while I did most the the programming and project management.

We set a Trello board and end up working for about 6 hours per day, I hope you enjoy playing as this little cat as much as have fun working on the project.
